name: Dungeness Crab Toasts
keywords: appetizer, crab meat, firm white bread, mayonnaise, scallion
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste
8 slices good-quality white bread, crusts removed, each cut in 1/2 on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl combine the crab, scallions and mayonnaise. Season to taste with salt, cayenne and lemon juice.
Toast the bread slices and spread with the crab mixture. Garnish with a small sprig of chervil and serve immediately.
